title: Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) (Amendment) (No.
heading: 3. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments
text_raw:
3. The Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments 
to General Practitioners) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 692 of 2019) (as amended 
by the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to 
General Practitioners) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 311 of 2020)) 
are amended by the substitution of the following Schedules for Schedules 1, 2, 
3, 8, 11, 22 and 34: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [685] 3

title: Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments to General Practitioners) (Amendment) (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations shall apply to payments in respect of services rendered by a 
general practitioner to or on behalf of the Health Service Executive under and 
in accordance with the terms of the General Medical Services Scheme and the 
National Immunisation Programmes. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 18 [685]
